title: Can only select one third party extension
body:
If I run the installer and want to select third party extensions, I can only check / uncheck one row, which is the first row I click on. After that, no other row reacts to input.
#### Reproduction steps/code
- Run the installer
- click "Third party extensions"
- try checking more than one extension.
#### Version of LibGDX and/or relevant dependencies

libgdx 1.9.3 release installer
#### Stacktrace
